title: Winner Announcement: Youth 4 Youth Challenge

introducer: Nadya Zhexembayeva, IEDC Bled School of Management
presenter: Sandi Češko, Studio Moderna finančne in intelektualne storitve ter trgovina, d.o.o.

segmentation: We now move to the next competition and this one has a suspense.
Contenders came to bless to present their five ideas in the competition.
Youth for Youth that was supported by Studio Moderna.
We heard from USA we heard from Philippines we heard from Macedonia from Pakistan an from Uganda, and the judges deliberated for many days.
It was a very intense discussion.
So it's my great pleasure to invite here Mr Sandy Czeschka to announce the surprise winners or winner.
Well, no speeches from me because I I came here to listen you and to hear new ideas from you because our generations in or have brought the world to this dead end that you have to fix today.
So that's why we also put the title youth for Youth 'cause you can help yourself much better that we can help you.
Don't count on us.
And I think it's time for change, really.
I'm not here in the campaign for Mr President Obama to win again.
But really, it's time to change to go from, you know, quantity, which was driven.
This growth and the development so far to quality.
It's time for quality.
It's time to move from machines to human beings, to the nature, to the environment and not only to grow more andmore, andmore material products so.
So it's up to you and we had very tough.
We are in very tough position.
Whom to give the awards and we have decided that the main price will go to.
Laura Gorlam she.
As you know, Laura prepares an not only in the words and the paper, but she realized the project to help the young people in Ghana to gain some education and to get some financial support.

She invented the project and which has already very good results and what our intention is now that not only award is enough, but we would like also to help her and will send her to the Clinton Global Initiative are also a member of the CGI United States of President Bill Clinton in two weeks time we have here also the European summit of the Clinton Global Initiative.
So Clinton Global Initiative has also event with universities.
United States would all students participate and they exchange their ideas and I hope that Laura will be able to present those ideas.
Also, the Clinton launch deal for universities next year and to share these ideas with others and gain more more more followers.
But but but wait, that's not all, so we also decided because there are two outstanding projects to give the same opportunity to Francisca Veer from Amanda.
So.

Sevier started a great work in Uganda, helping the Nomad people to grow the agricultural products, and he was unfortunate, so his equipment was stolen and we will send him too as well so we don't have to.
Yes, but only one, but more important is here is a ticket for the Clinton Global Steel for next year in in United States.
